2052.subject: FREN
2052.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the third semester of French. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in FREN 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in FREN 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in FREN 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in FREN 201 or 202.
